What is Trap-Neuter-Return?

TNR is the humane solution to community cat overpopulation. We safely trap cats, have them spayed/neutered and vaccinated, then return them to their territories. It's proven, cost-effective, and creates healthier neighborhoods for everyone.

Your Donation Helps

$25 Vaccines one community cat
$50 Spays/neuters one cat
$100 Complete TNR for two cats
$250 Sponsors a full TNR day

Every dollar goes directly to helping cats in Brooks County, GA
